last_episode_to_air.name: The Route to Murder
last_episode_to_air.overview: Calvi escapes Italian authorities and flees to London, as we look in greater detail at who he was with during his final hours and how his death came about.

name: Murder of God's Banker
overview: The death of a fugitive Italian banker in London sets off an investigation into an international conspiracy that goes all the way to the Vatican.

episodes.name: Too Many Suspects
episodes.overview: Roberto Calvi's death sparks international outcry and interest over its mysterious circumstances and the shadowy circles he moved in.

episodes.name: Potere Occulto
episodes.overview: Calvi's family pushes for a new investigation as we learn about the mysterious P2 group, and the role they played in Italian power politics.

episodes.name: The Merciless Padlock
episodes.overview: The walls start to close in around Calvi as one of his partners faces jail time and investigators are breathing down his neck.

episodes.name: The Route to Murder
episodes.overview: Calvi escapes Italian authorities and flees to London, as we look in greater detail at who he was with during his final hours and how his death came about.
